message: Let's start fair. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor, as the money will lose value quicker for you.
Considering the inflation, I think 55/45 is a more reasonable split.
I'm willing to compromise, but I still need to get a bigger share due to the inflation. Let's split it 52/48 in my favor.
The inflation is affecting me more, I need at least half to make it worthwhile.
